checkAccountDenyForNoAccessLevel(uint8).details: Check if transaction passes Account Deny For No Access Level rule.This has no stored rule as there are no additional variables needed.

params._accessLevel: the Access Level of the account

checkAccountMaxValueByAccessLevel(uint32.details: Check if transaction passes Account Max Value By AccessLevel rule.

params._accessLevel: the Access Level of the account
params._amountToTransfer: total USD amount to be transferred with 18 decimals of precision
params._balance: account's beginning balance in USD with 18 decimals of precision

checkAccountMaxValueOutByAccessLevel(uin.details: Check if transaction passes Account Max Value Out By Access Level rule.

params._accessLevel: the Access Level of the account
params._usdAmountTransferring: total USD amount to be transferred with 18 decimals of precision
params._usdWithdrawalTotal: account's total amount withdrawn in USD with 18 decimals of precision

getAccountMaxValueByAccessLevel(uint32,u.details: Function to get the Account Max Value By Access Level rule in the rule set that belongs to the Access Level

returns._0: balanceAmount balance allowed for access level

getAccountMaxValueOutByAccessLevel(uint3.details: Function to get the Account Max Value Out By Access Level rule in the rule set that belongs to the Access Level

returns._0: balanceAmount balance allowed for access level

getTotalAccountMaxValueByAccessLevel().details: Function to get total Account Max Value By Access Level rules

getTotalAccountMaxValueOutByAccessLevel(.details: Function to get total Account Max Value Out By Access Level rules

returns._0: Total number of access level withdrawal rules
